ADLGLSyncModuleID Struct Reference

Structure containing GL-Sync module information. More...


Data Fields

int iModuleID
 Unique GL-Sync module ID.
int iGlSyncGPUPort
 GL-Sync GPU port index (to be passed into ADLGLSyncGenlockConfig.lSignalSource and ADLGlSyncPortControl.lSignalSource).
int iFWBootSectorVersion
 GL-Sync module firmware version of Boot Sector.
int iFWUserSectorVersion
 GL-Sync module firmware version of User Sector.

Detailed Description

Structure containing GL-Sync module information.

This structure is used to retrieve GL-Sync module information for Workstation Framelock/Genlock.

Field Documentation

int ADLGLSyncModuleID::iModuleID

Unique GL-Sync module ID.

int ADLGLSyncModuleID::iGlSyncGPUPort

GL-Sync GPU port index (to be passed into ADLGLSyncGenlockConfig.lSignalSource and ADLGlSyncPortControl.lSignalSource).

int ADLGLSyncModuleID::iFWBootSectorVersion

GL-Sync module firmware version of Boot Sector.

int ADLGLSyncModuleID::iFWUserSectorVersion

GL-Sync module firmware version of User Sector.
